item.description:
Join us for our 3rd annual Central Square Pub Crawl along Mass Ave.

SCHEDULED BELOW:

2:00pm - Plough & Stars
3:00pm - People's Republik (CASH ONLY)
4:00pm - Tavern in the Square
5:00pm - The Field
6:00pm - Phoenix Landing
7:00pm - Middle East (CORNER)
8:00pm - Asgard

All are welcome to attend... the more, the merrier.

This crawl has been posted with the Fun with Alcohol, Social Fun, and Red Sox Natives Meetup Groups and through Facebook.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and so should you! Just look for the tall guy at the bar.
item.name: 3rd Annual Central Square Pub Crawl
